title: Part I
detail: People with cancer frequently have symptoms that are caused by their diseade or by their treatment. Patients with heart failure may have similar symptoms. We ask you to rate how severe the following symptoms have been in the last 24 hours. Pleasr fill in the circle below from 0(symptom has not been present) to 10(the symptom was as bad as you can imagine it could be) for each item.

form.symptom: Your pain is WORST?
Your fatigue(triedness) at its WORST?
Your nausea at its WORST?
Your disturbed sleep at its WORST?
Your feeling of being distressed(upset) at its WORST?
Your shortness of breath at its WORST?
Your problem with remembering things at its WORST?
Your problem with lack of appetite at its WORST?
Your feeling drowsy (sleepy) at its WORST?
Your having a dry mouth at its WORST?
Your feeling sad at its WORST?
Your voimiting at its WORST?
Your numbness or tingling at its WORST?
Your disturbed sleep at its WORST?
Your problem with abdominal bloating at its WORST?
Your difficulty sleeping without adding more pillows unde your head at its WORST?
Your problem with lack of energy at its WORST?
Your problem with racing heart beat (palpitation) at its WORST?
Your problem with nighttime cough at its WORST?
Your problem with difficulty breathing at its WORST?
Your problem with sudden weight gain at its WORST?

How have are your symptoms interfered with your life?
Symptoms frequently interfere with how we feel and function. How much have your symptoms interfered with the following items in the last 24 hours:
